titleInfo.title: A Giant Country Music Show with Charlie Walker and Johnny Carver at Alpena Armory (18167)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing a Giant Country Music Show with Charlie Walker and Johnny Carver at Alpena Armory on November 5. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/43251/
